CustomField.description: BODEV-2792 New SF Field(s) AWS Rekognition & DPA Legal BO-2125: Name change requested from “AI Functionalities“ to “Face Recognition Opt-in/out“
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select opt-in: when customer provides written statement confirming they would like to use Face Recognition. Select opt-out: when customer expresses they would not like to use Face Recognition. (Email and checkbox sufficient).
CustomField.label: Face Recognition Opt-in/out
